item.title: 投资公司联席首席执行官本-加西姆将在三十年后离职
item.description: 中东最大的另类资产管理公司将在 30 年后失去一位最资深的高管，作为全面改组的一部分，董事长穆罕默德-阿拉迪（Mohammed Alardhi）将接任首席执行官一职。【原文：The largest alternative asset manager in the Middle East is set to lose one of its most senior executives after 30 years, as part of a sweeping reshuffle that will involve Chairman Mohammed Alardhi taking over as chief executive officer.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 接近达成 130 亿美元收购 AirTrunk 的交易
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 接近达成以 200 亿澳元（135 亿美元）（包括债务）收购澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk 的交易，这可能是今年最大的数字基础设施交易之一。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to acquire Australian data center operator AirTrunk for A$20 billion ($13.5 billion) including debt, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the largest digital infrastructure deals this year.】

item.title: 瑞典房价因利率下降而有所回升
item.description: 瑞典国有贷款机构瑞典银行（SBAB）的数据显示，由于瑞典央行降息降低了购房融资成本，8月份瑞典房价有所上涨。【原文：Housing prices in Sweden rose in August as rate cuts by the country’s central bank have made it less expensive to finance home purchases, data from state-owned lender SBAB showed.】

item.title: 韩国将在 2025 年创纪录地削减外汇稳定基金
item.description: 韩国将在明年把外汇稳定基金的规模削减 30% 以上，创下历史新高，尽管政府表示这仍足以保护韩元。【原文：South Korea will cut the size of its foreign exchange stabilization fund by more than 30% next year, a record amount, though the government says that’s still sufficient to defend the won.】

item.title: 外国资金争夺战白热化，沙特力图削减繁文缛节
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯希望减少繁文缛节，让外国投资者更容易向沙特王国注入资金，这是它在激烈的竞争中将自己打造成中东首要投资中心的最新努力。【原文：Saudi Arabia is looking to cut red tape and make it easier for foreign investors to pump cash into the kingdom, its latest effort to establish itself as the Middle East’s premier investment hub amid stiff competition.】

item.title: 瑞士香料生产商 Givaudan 考虑进军宠物食品市场
item.description: 瑞士香料和调味品集团 Givaudan SA 正在考虑进入宠物食品市场，有可能通过收购的方式，以期在这一快速增长的行业中占据优势。【原文：Swiss fragrance and flavor group Givaudan SA is considering entering the pet food market, potentially via acquisitions, in a bid to take advantage of a fast-growing sector.】

item.title: 前台北市长在贪污调查中获释
item.description: 前台北市长、前总统候选人柯文哲在贪污调查中被捕后获释，这可能威胁到这位政治家及其新成立的台湾人民党的政治前途。【原文：Ko Wen-je, ex-mayor of Taipei and former presidential hopeful, was released from detention after being arrested in a graft investigation that could threaten the political future of the politician and his upstart Taiwan People’s Party.】

item.title: 电池金属价格暴跌，天齐锂业扭亏为盈
item.description: 受电池材料价格大幅下滑的影响，中国一家大型锂生产商出现了自 2020 年以来的首次半年亏损。【原文：A major Chinese lithium producer swung to its first half-year loss since 2020, hit by the battery material’s massive price slump.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 出售印度主权债券以购买信贷
item.description: 印度加入全球债券指数吸引了投资者对该国主权债务的关注。一家市值 1,020 亿美元的基金公司的资产经理表示，现在是时候将部分资金转向公司债券了。【原文：India’s entry into a global bond index drew investors to the nation’s sovereign debt. It’s now time to rotate some of the money to corporate debt, according to an asset manager at a $102 billion fund house.】

item.title: 新世界和 Scion 首席执行官的香港房地产之痛加剧
item.description: 周一上午，新世界发展有限公司的股价下跌了 14%，香港房地产市场的低迷给这家亿万富翁郑氏家族拥有的公司带来了压力。【原文：New World Development Co.’s shares fell as much as 14% Monday morning, as Hong Kong’s property downturn weighs on the firm owned by the billionaire Cheng family.】

item.title: 分析师称日经指数可能增加两印经济学，削减日本制纸
item.description: 日本日经 225 平均指数的指数编制机构预计最早将于周一宣布其定期审查结果，分析师预测该蓝筹股指数将增加无印良品连锁店运营商 Ryohin Keikaku Co.，并删除日本造纸工业株式会社（Nippon Paper Industries Co.【原文：The index compiler of Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average is expected to announce its periodic review as early as Monday, with analysts forecasting the blue-chip gauge will add Muji chain operator Ryohin Keikaku Co. and remove Nippon Paper Industries Co.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 酝酿竞购价值 50 亿美元的英国房产网站 Rightmove
item.description: 鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）庞大帝国旗下的 REA 集团有限公司正在考虑以 58 亿美元的价格收购英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc，以创建一家全球性的数字房地产公司。【原文：REA Group Ltd., part of Rupert Murdoch’s sprawling empire, is considering a takeover offer for $5.8 billion UK property portal Rightmove Plc in a bid to create a global digital real estate company.】

item.title: 中国不断增加的大宗商品库存暴露了经济放缓的深度
item.description: 中国的主要原材料库存堆积如山，这表明经济活动依然疲软，无法清理过剩的原材料，而过剩的原材料压低了从钢铁到大豆的价格。【原文：Inventories of key raw materials are piling up in China, evidence that economic activity remains too feeble to clear a surplus that’s crushing prices from steel to soybeans.】

item.title: 美联储和日本央行明确利率，日元预期转为上涨
item.description: 在日本央行 7 月加息和美联储最近发出即将削减美国借贷成本的信号后，货币策略师对日元的走势进行了彻底的反思。【原文：Currency strategists have had a radical rethink on the trajectory of the yen in the wake of the Bank of Japan’s interest rate hike in July and the Federal Reserve’s recent signaling of looming cuts to US borrowing costs.】

item.title: 台币可能在美联储会议后的亚洲潜在反弹中落伍
item.description: 在美联储开始实施宽松政策后，台湾货币的表现可能会再次逊于亚洲同类货币，因为台湾在利率方面处于相当不利的地位，而且当地企业持有美元的动机更强。【原文：Taiwan’s currency may again underperform its Asian peers in any rally after the Federal Reserve starts easing policy, given a considerable interest rate disadvantage and local firms’ stronger incentives to hold the dollar.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 中国制造业和房地产数据令人失望以色列准备发动大规模战争罢工菲律宾发现度假酒店中的诈骗农场。您今天需要了解的信息【原文：China’s manufacturing and property figures disappoint. Israel poised for mass strike over war. Philippines uncovers scam farms in resort hotel. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增产迹象和中国困境导致石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 有迹象表明，欧佩克+将推进从10月份开始提高产量的计划，而中国的经济阻力也在增加，因此石油走低。【原文：Oil pushed lower on signs OPEC+ will progress with a plan to lift output from October, while economic headwinds mount in China.】

item.title: 工党称，如果燃油补贴继续存在，英国将面临英镑暴跌的风险
item.description: 下议院领袖露西-鲍威尔（Lucy Powell）说，如果英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）没有取消为 1,000 万养老金领取者提供的冬季燃料补贴以填补公共财政缺口，英国将面临英镑挤兑、利率上升和经济紧缩。【原文：Britain would have faced a run on the pound, higher interest rates and an economic crunch had Chancellor Rachel Reeves not scrapped a winter fuel payment for 10 million pensioners to fill a hole in the public finances, House of Commons Leader Lucy Powell said.】

item.title: 英国北海石油游说团警告称意外增税将导致投资下滑
item.description: 行业游说团体警告说，英国对北海石油和天然气实行的新税制可能导致投资下滑 80% 以上。【原文：The UK’s new tax regime for North Sea oil and gas could lead to an investment slump of more than 80%, the industry lobby group warned.】

item.title: 中国工厂数据公布后，亚洲市场谨慎开盘：市场综述
item.description: 由于越来越多的迹象表明，中国为支持其萎靡不振的经济所做的努力尚未见效，亚洲股市将以谨慎的姿态进入一个历史上动荡不安的月份。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a cautious start into a historically volatile month for markets as signs mount that China’s efforts to support its ailing economy are yet to take hold.】

item.title: 香港正在兴起一种投注科技股的新方式
item.description: 有一种新的方式可以押注一些最受关注的香港股票。【原文：There’s a new way to bet on some of the most watched Hong Kong stocks.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡正逐步接近十多年来从未见过的价格。石油在八月的跌宕起伏让交易商们对年底可能出现的颠簸做好了准备。此外，大豆、玉米和小麦的丰产也拖累了谷物与其他商品的走势。【原文：Arabica coffee is edging closer to prices not seen in more than a decade. Oil’s rocky August has traders bracing for what could be a bumpy ride toward the end of the year. And an abundance of soybean, corn and wheat are proving a drag for grains versus other commodities.】

item.title: 停火协议压力增大，以色列准备发动袭击
item.description: 以色列最大的劳工组织准备在周一举行全国性罢工，这是为迫使政府在加沙停火并确保释放被哈马斯扣押的人质而做出的最有力的推动。【原文：Israel’s largest labor group is poised for a nationwide strike on Monday, the strongest push yet to force the government into a Gaza cease-fire and secure the release of hostages held by Hamas.】

item.title: 汉莎航空首席执行官前往葡萄牙参加有关 TAP 的政府会谈
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）首席执行官卡斯滕-施波尔（Carsten Spohr）将于周一会见葡萄牙政府官员，因为这家德国航空集团正在权衡对国有航空公司 TAP SA 进行投资的可能性。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG Chief Executive Officer Carsten Spohr is set to meet with Portuguese government officials on Monday as the German airline group weighs a possible investment in state-owned airline TAP SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 凯尔-巴斯（Kyle Bass）说，"石油黑幕 "始终是 ESG 的败笔
item.description: 凯尔-巴斯（Kyle Bass）认为，华尔街最具争议的投资策略之一，如果其捍卫者从一开始就表现得更温和一些，现在可能就不会那么受人非议了。【原文：One of the most contentious investing strategies on Wall Street might be a lot less beleaguered right now if its defenders had shown a bit more moderation from the get-go, according to Kyle Bass.】
